full_summary:
### Notification of Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Project Title/Title of the Project** 
Task and Solutions Professional Services – 2.1 Business Analyst and 2.2 Business Continuity Consultant - Level 2 (Intermediate)

**Project Reference Number**
cb-5970-95844488

**Category**
Supply Arrangement (SA)

**Publication Date**
May 31, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
July 5, 2023, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time

**Location**
National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Contracting Agency**
Health Canada (Santé Canada)

**Description of the Requirement**
Health Canada, Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) requires the services of up to four (4) TSPS Level 2 Business Analysts and up to two (2) TSPS Level 2 Business Continuity Consultants to offer services across the HPFB on an as-and-when-required basis.

**Scope of Work**
The scope of work includes providing professional services in business analysis and business continuity, specifically:

* Job stream: Business Consulting/Change Management Stream
	+ Business Analyst (Level 2)
	+ Business Continuity Consultant (Level 2)

**Invited Suppliers**
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ADGA Group Consultants Inc
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp and Randstad Interim Inc
* Bridgetown Consulting Inc
* Cistel Technology Inc
* Donna Cona Inc
* Elevated Thinking Inc
* Integra Networks Corporation
* IT/Net – Ottawa Inc
* Levio Conseils Inc
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc
* MGIS Inc
* NATTIQ Inc
* NavPoint Consulting Group Inc
* Randstad Interim Inc
* Tato Recruiting Inc., S.I. Systems ULC, in Joint Venture

**How to Obtain the RFP Documents**
To obtain the RFP documents, please visit the Canadian e-buying system at [link].

**Closing Date for Submissions**
July 5, 2023, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries, please contact:
Yvonne Murphy
Email: [yvonne.murphy@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:yvonne.murphy@hc-sc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 543-1965

**Notice**
This RFP is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders
